column2: geom_label(label= paste("Mean", round(mean(ames$Sale_Price), 2), sep =": "), x=250000, y=0.000007, label.padding = unit(0.55, "lines"), label.size = 0.25, fill = "#845EC2", color = "white"
geom_label(label= paste("Median", round(median(ames$Sale_Price), 2), sep =": "), x=100000, y=0.000006, label.padding = unit(0.55, "lines"), label.size = 0.25, fill = "#4B4453", color = "white"
